data.name: RPG Maker MZ - Heroine Character Generator 8 for MZ
data.detailed_description:
Heroine Character Generator Pack 8 is now compatible for MZ! Featuring nearly a hundred options when it comes to piecing together your next heroine. This pack contains accessories, clothing, eyes, and hair so you can generate a unique look for your next female star. Items include different headbands such as flowers, birds, and crowns, along with neck and shoulder wear to add some prestige to your character, and unique eyes and various hairstyles. Add these styles today with the Heroine Character Generator 8 pack!

Features:

* Clothes: 20 Female
* Eyes: 5 sets
* Accessories: 11 Female
* Beast ears: 1 set
* Front Hair: 5 Female
* Rear Hair: 5 Female
* Compatible with RPG Maker MZ

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Makers, Visual Novel games or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
